ext_description.message: Shows Flash traces, warnings, and errors on the console in Chrome Developer Tools.

bg_fp_lt9.message: Version of active Flash Player is less than 9.

bg_fp_notDebugger.message: Active Flash Player is not Debugger.

bg_fp_setting.message:
1. Download and install version 9 or above Debugger Player from this page.
2. Make pre-installed Player disabled and just installed Player enabled on chrome://plugins/.
3. Restart Chrome.

More information : http://flconsole.minodisk.net/checklist/
